name: BIC Flex 3 Men`s 3 Blade Disposable Razor
description: Enjoy exceptional razor performance with the BIC Flex3 Men's Disposable Razor. This disposable razor features a pivoting head with three flexible blades that individually adjust to the contours of your face, jaw and neck to deliver a smooth, close shave. The ergonomic handle helps provide a good grip on the razor for enhanced control. The Flex3 Hybrid razor also has a lubricating strip for enhanced glide.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
